subsection.name: General
subsection.p: The splitpane can contain two other widgets, on the bottom and on the top. You can set the property pane with the values top and bottom. If you don't specify the property it will first add one to top and after that to the bottom. Xulux will set the properties for you on the widgets in that case.

tr.td: Values can be horizontal or vertical
This property can be used on childwidgets (can be a splitpane too) to specify where they should end up. Valid values are bottom and top
